cyclone.name: CLAUDETTE
cyclone.current_location: about 320 miles ESE of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward, passing well off the U.S. Mid-Atlantic coast and southeast of Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeast of Nova Scotia, Canada (no U.S. landfall expected)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeast Nova Scotia, Sable Island, and Newfoundland coastal waters
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; only breezy conditions possible.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only light spotty showers possible; significant rainfall not expected.
